answers.answer_text: Answers related to respiration and exercise.

sub_answers.marking_notes: Lungs: Any two points (1 mark each). Circulation: Any two points (1 mark each).
Any two points required. (1 mark each)
Any three points required. (1 mark each)

sub_answers.text:
Line starts close to rest point line on y axis + continues upwards on same straight line as before training;
Maximum oxygen consumption is higher + reached at higher exercise intensity;
